body:
This is a SURVEY which many said a Poll isn't accurate enough so I made it a survey same rules as before :


This survey will not change anything we wanted to find out what other people think of the staff!(Asked by many to do this)

RULES:
Don't vote more than once,
Don't just vote to be against the staff team,
You NEED to be honest try not to lie thanks,
Don't go against any staff please.



SURVEY  :https://survey.zohopublic.com/zs/wxCNlt

I'm not sure what this will turn out with but , some of the results might surprise me or others .

title: Avicus Staff Team SURVEY instead of Poll

replies.body: What are the results reveal them! :D
